query:
SELECT u.id, u.username, 
        COALESCE(SUM(s.weight_kg * s.reps), 0.0) as total_volume
        FROM users u
        LEFT JOIN workouts w ON u.id = w.user_id
        LEFT JOIN sets s ON w.id = s.workout_id
        GROUP BY u.id, u.username
        ORDER BY total_volume DESC
        LIMIT 10
